Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class BaseProductionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.SubSceneController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.BaseProductionController
public class BaseProductionController extends SubSceneController
Represents the base production on the player dashboard.
